thread.title: UK PM May's party was approached by Cambridge Analytica, but no work undertaken - spokesman

title: UK PM May's party was approached by Cambridge Analytica, but no work undertaken - spokesman
text: March 21, 2018 / 1:21 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago UK PM May's party was approached by Cambridge Analytica, but no work undertaken - spokesman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON, March 21 (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Theresa May’s Conservative Party was approached by consultancy Cambridge Analytica, but did not take the proposal forward, a spokesman for May said on Wednesday. “An approach was made and the party decided not to take that forward,” May’s political spokesman said. He said the approach pre-dated May’s time as leader, but did not have further details immediately available. (Reporting by William James, editing by Elizabeth Piper)
